description: The Amzer Hot Pink Jelly Case is made out of 100% premium silicone and is a great, light-weight option for protecting your Apple iPad 2. The durable silicone absorbs any shock your Apple iPad 2 may receive from any accidental drops or bumps, keeping it just like new. The smooth silicone gives you a sure and lasting grip on your Apple iPad 2 and minimizes sliding on flat surfaces. You have full access to your Apple iPad 2 without removing it from the case. The Jelly Case is truly like a second skin and a must have accessory!
title: Amzer Silicone Skin Jelly Case for Apple iPad 2 - Hot Pink (AMZ90792)
